apps:property.name: hasTheWord
apps:property.value: ("was submitted successfully" OR ("You" AND "submitted an application") OR "Your application has been received. Good luck!" OR "What happens now? apps:property.name: doesNotHaveTheWord
apps:property.value: verify OR password OR bank OR chase

apps:property.name: hasTheWord
apps:property.value: ("Your application" AND "was viewed!") OR ("received" AND "your application") OR "We noticed that you haven't heard back"
